text: @piersmorgan @BorisJohnson No questions today at the briefing about Covi-19, infection numbers, hospital admissions and deaths etc. Am beginning to believe that these hypocritical journalists don’t give a stuff about the impacts of Coronavirus and would rather indulge in point scoring!
